trans-unit.target: 右键单击即可解锁配方。

trans-unit.source: It's rare to see a wild apple tree growing this big. The apples look crispy and juicy.
trans-unit.target: 野生苹果树长到这么大，实属罕见。苹果看起来又脆又多汁。

trans-unit.source: These green shoots are highly nutritious plant that offers both culinary delight and ecological benefits.
trans-unit.target: 这些绿芽营养价值极高，既能提供美食，又能带来生态效益。

trans-unit.source: Maybe I can knock this down from far away . . .
trans-unit.target: 也许我可以从很远的地方把它打下来.

trans-unit.source: The damp and dark environment seem like a perfect habitat for these strange mushrooms.
trans-unit.target: 潮湿阴暗的环境似乎是这些奇怪蘑菇的完美栖息地。

trans-unit.source: These spicy bushes require a lot of sunlight to grow.
trans-unit.target: 这些辛辣的灌木丛需要大量的阳光才能生长。

trans-unit.source: The cranberries look like little red marbles. I bet they taste great!
trans-unit.target: 蔓越莓看起来就像红色的小弹珠。我敢打赌，它们的味道一定很棒！

trans-unit.source: What makes an elderberry 'elder'? Is it because the berry has gone old?
trans-unit.target: 是什么让接骨木成为 “接骨木”？是因为浆果变老了吗？

trans-unit.source: The refreshing scent from these leaves makes you think of a nice spring breeze.
trans-unit.target: 这些树叶散发出沁人心脾的香味，让人不禁想起和煦的春风。

trans-unit.source: These vibrant raspberries look ripe and delicious. The culinary possibilities are endless.
trans-unit.target: 这些生机勃勃的覆盆子看起来成熟美味。烹饪的可能性是无限的。

trans-unit.source: A tall grain that grows in warm climates. You can make flour and brew alcohol with this.
trans-unit.target: 一种生长在温暖气候中的高大谷物。您可以用它制作面粉和酿造酒。

trans-unit.source: An elegant looking bush with plump strawberries growing on its stems.
trans-unit.target: 这种灌木看起来很优雅，茎上长着丰满的草莓。

trans-unit.source: I wonder how you are supposed to eat this?
trans-unit.target: 我想知道你该怎么吃这个？

trans-unit.source: You make tea using almost anything, but these leaves are always the foundation of a good brew.
trans-unit.target: 您几乎可以用任何东西泡茶，但这些茶叶始终是泡出好茶的基础。

trans-unit.source: This leafy plant typically grows in shallow, slow-moving freshwater. The swamp is a perfect home for this.
trans-unit.target: 这种多叶植物通常生长在水流缓慢的浅淡水中。沼泽是它的理想家园。

trans-unit.source: These are smaller than cultivated carrots, but they possess some unique, earthly flavors.
trans-unit.target: 这些胡萝卜比栽培胡萝卜小，但却具有一些独特的泥土味道。

trans-unit.source: This should be great in salads and soups.
trans-unit.target: 用它来做沙拉和汤应该很不错。

trans-unit.source: The aroma from this musrhoom smells sweet and earthly. Think if all the possibilities!
trans-unit.target: 这种麝香散发出甜美和泥土的芳香。想想所有的可能性！

trans-unit.source: This is a staple in Asian cuisine. I should use a scythe to harvest this.
trans-unit.target: 这是亚洲菜的主食。我应该用镰刀来收割它。

trans-unit.source: A source for a healthy and nutricious meal. However, it will be difficult to draw great flavors from this.
trans-unit.target: 健康营养的膳食来源。然而，要从中汲取美味却很困难。

trans-unit.source: A commonly cultivated grain with a variety of uses.
trans-unit.target: 一种常见的谷物，有多种用途。

trans-unit.source: The strangely shaped beans contains the essence of chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 形状奇特的巧克力豆蕴含着巧克力的精华。

trans-unit.source: Once fully grown, the bark of the tree can be peeled off to make cinnamon sticks.
trans-unit.target: 一旦完全长成，树皮就可以剥下来做成肉桂棒。

trans-unit.source: This tree is difficult to grow and requires a lot of sunlight.
trans-unit.target: 这种树很难生长，需要大量的阳光。

trans-unit.source: If this produces beans fast enough, you can have free coffee every day!
trans-unit.target: 如果生产咖啡豆的速度足够快，你就可以每天喝到免费的咖啡！

trans-unit.source: This flowering plant has a distinct, aromatic scent.
trans-unit.target: 这种开花植物具有独特的芳香气味。

trans-unit.source: Think of all the wine you could make!
trans-unit.target: 想想你能酿出多少美酒？

trans-unit.source: It's time to expand your lemonade empire.
trans-unit.target: 是时候扩大你的柠檬水帝国了。

trans-unit.source: A commonly used ingredient in cooking. It is also quick and easy to grow.
trans-unit.target: 烹饪中的常用配料。此外，它还能快速、轻松地生长。

trans-unit.source: This citrus tree requires a lot of sunlight and warmth to grow.
trans-unit.target: 这种柑橘树的生长需要大量的阳光和温暖。

trans-unit.source: It looks pointy everywhere . . . Better be careful with this.
trans-unit.target: 它看起来到处都是尖的. . . 最好小心点

trans-unit.source: The potato is still a stable in the cuisine of most cultures.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数文化中，马铃薯仍然是一种稳定的美食。

trans-unit.source: This little plant is the basis of Italian cuisine.
trans-unit.target: 这种小植物是意大利美食的基础。

trans-unit.source: These roots are tangled together in unexpected ways.
trans-unit.target: 这些树根以意想不到的方式纠缠在一起。

trans-unit.source: It smells very sweet and aromatic.
So this is where the life of a pastry begins.
trans-unit.target: 这就是糕点生命的开始。

trans-unit.source: Green, shooted vegetables that taste better than it looks.
trans-unit.target: 绿色、带笋的蔬菜，味道比看起来更好。

trans-unit.source: A very popular Chinese liquor. It's as clear as water.
trans-unit.target: 一种非常受欢迎的中国白酒。它像水一样清澈。

trans-unit.source: This grain is useful for brewing alcohols.
trans-unit.target: 这种谷物可用于酿造酒精。

trans-unit.source: Nothing beats a cold one on a hot summer day.
trans-unit.target: 没有什么比在炎炎夏日喝上一杯冰镇啤酒更惬意了。

trans-unit.source: Yellow variant of a mild pepper.
Deep blue berry that contains various health benefits.
trans-unit.target: 深蓝色浆果，具有多种保健功效。

trans-unit.source: Leaner than pork, but still delicious.
A golden liquor created from distilling wine.
trans-unit.target: 由葡萄酒蒸馏而成的金色酒液。

trans-unit.source: A popular Brazilian alcohol made from sugarcane juice.
trans-unit.target: 一种用甘蔗汁制成的巴西流行酒。

trans-unit.source: This highly sought-after delicacy can only found in Sturgeon.
trans-unit.target: 这种广受欢迎的美食只有在鲟鱼中才能找到。

trans-unit.source: A tasty red fruit. Hard to find these days.
trans-unit.target: 美味的红色水果。现在很难找到了。

trans-unit.source: This was just laying on the beach.

trans-unit.target: 它是如何变成巧克力的？

trans-unit.source: This delicious crustacean has endless culinary possibilities!
trans-unit.target: 这种美味的甲壳类动物有无限的烹饪可能性！

trans-unit.source: Surprisingly sour, but could be useful for salads and beverages.
trans-unit.target: 酸味令人吃惊，但可用于沙拉和饮料。

trans-unit.source: A nutritious root vegetable popular in Asian cuisines.
trans-unit.target: 一种营养丰富的根茎类蔬菜，在亚洲菜肴中很受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: Beef-like taste with an added nutty flavor.
trans-unit.target: 牛肉般的口感，还带有坚果的香味。

trans-unit.source: This golden root has incredible health properties.
trans-unit.target: 这种金色根茎具有令人难以置信的保健功效。

trans-unit.source: It has a sweet and tangy flavor. You can make wine from this.
trans-unit.target: 它的味道香甜可口。您可以用它来酿酒。
非常适合制作沙拉和汉堡。

trans-unit.source: A golden liquor made from fermented honey water.
trans-unit.target: 一种由蜂蜜水发酵制成的金黄色酒。

trans-unit.source: A staple ingredient in all cuisines. Creamy!
trans-unit.target: 所有菜肴中的主食配料。奶油味
这是一种棕色的克雷米尼蘑菇。

trans-unit.source: A staple ingredient in many dishes.
trans-unit.target: 是许多菜肴的主要配料。

trans-unit.source: Your daily dose of vitamin C.
trans-unit.target: 你每天所需的维生素 C

trans-unit.source: A Turkish spirit made through distilling fermented grape juice.
trans-unit.target: 一种通过蒸馏发酵葡萄汁制成的土耳其烈酒。

trans-unit.source: A delicious tropical fruit. It's hard to find these days.
trans-unit.target: 一种美味的热带水果。现在很难找到了。

trans-unit.source: An ancient relative of the domestic chicken.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away!
trans-unit.target: 一天一苹果，医生远离我！

trans-unit.source: Dark red alcohol made from grapes.
trans-unit.target: 用葡萄酿制的深红色酒精。

trans-unit.source: The result of a failed brewing experiment.
Popular alcohol originating from sugar canes.
This is the most expensive spice on the planet. It can only be found on the rare Crocus flower.
trans-unit.target: 这是地球上最昂贵的香料。它只能在稀有的番红花上找到。

trans-unit.source: A Japanese rice wine that goes great with a variety of foods. Kanpai!
trans-unit.target: 日本米酒，适合搭配各种食物。Kanpai！

trans-unit.source: A common fish. It can be made into a variety of dishes.
trans-unit.target: 一种常见的鱼。它可以做成各种菜肴。

trans-unit.source: There is some meaty goodness inside this shell.
trans-unit.target: 这个外壳里可有不少肉呢。

trans-unit.source: Is this what the sea tastes like?
A Korean alcohol made from rice.
trans-unit.target: 一种用大米酿制的韩国酒。

trans-unit.source: A nutritious grain with a variety of uses.
trans-unit.target: 一种营养丰富、用途广泛的谷物。

trans-unit.source: This wine bubbles and fizzles. Watch out for the cork!
trans-unit.target: 这款酒会冒泡，也会起泡。小心软木塞！

trans-unit.source: A long, slimy mollusc found in the ocean.
trans-unit.target: 海洋中发现的一种长长的、粘乎乎的软体动物。

trans-unit.source: Delicious red fruit that's hard to find these days.
trans-unit.target: 美味的红色水果如今很难找到。

trans-unit.source: Sweet when you chew on this.
This extremely rare mushroom can sometimes be found growing underground, often attached to tree roots.
trans-unit.target: 这种极其罕见的蘑菇有时会在地下生长，通常附着在树根上。
一种从兰花中提取的香料。

trans-unit.source: A clear liquor made from potato mash.
trans-unit.target: 用马铃薯泥制成的透明酒。

trans-unit.source: The meat that surpasses all others.
Perfect for a hot, sunny day.
A common edible plant found in bodies of water.
trans-unit.target: 水体中常见的一种可食用植物。

trans-unit.source: You can make flour and several kinds of alcohol with these.
trans-unit.target: 您可以用它们制作面粉和多种酒精。

trans-unit.source: Brown liquor made from fermented grain mash.
trans-unit.target: 由发酵谷物醪制成的棕色白酒。

trans-unit.source: Harvested from the wild rice plant found in bodies of water.
Plant this to grow an apple tree.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出苹果树。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow an asparagus plant.
Plant this to grow a banana tree.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能种出香蕉树。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a carrot plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能长出胡萝卜。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a cherry tree.
Plant this to grow a cinnamon tree.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出一棵肉桂树。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a cocoa tree.
Plant this to grow a coconut tree.
Plant this to grow a coffea plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这棵树，就能种出一棵咖啡树。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a cranberry bush.
trans-unit.target: 种下它就能长出蔓越莓灌木丛。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a daikon plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能种出萝卜。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow an eggplant plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能长出一株茄子。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow an elderberry bush.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出接骨木灌木丛。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a ginger plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能种出一株生姜。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a grapevine.
trans-unit.target: 种下它就能长出葡萄藤。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a hot pepper bush.
Plant this to grow a cacao tree.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出一棵可可树。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a lettuce plant.
Plant this to grow a mango tree.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能种出一棵芒果树。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a mint plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能种出一株薄荷。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow an orange seed.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出一颗橙子种子。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a pineapple plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能种出一株菠萝。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a raspberry bush.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出树莓灌木丛。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a rice plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能长出水稻。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a spinach plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能种出一株菠菜。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a strawberry bush.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能长出草莓丛。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a sugarcane plant.
Plant this to grow a tomato vine.
trans-unit.target: 种下它就能长出番茄藤。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a vanilla plant.
trans-unit.target: 种下它，就能种出一株香草。

trans-unit.source: Plant this to grow a watermelon plant.

trans-unit.target: 种下这个，就能种出小麦。

trans-unit.source: This fibrous material is collected from dug up vegetation.
trans-unit.target: 这种纤维材料是从挖出的植被中收集的。

trans-unit.source: It's rare to find such a large and beautifully twisted root. Artists would love to have this.
trans-unit.target: 如此巨大且扭曲优美的树根实属罕见。艺术家们都想拥有它。

trans-unit.source: This bright yellow crystal has a wide variety of uses in modern-day industry.
trans-unit.target: 这种明亮的黄色晶体在现代工业中用途广泛。

trans-unit.source: A commonly found crystal. This raw material is often used in construction and technologies.
trans-unit.target: 一种常见的晶体。这种原材料常用于建筑和技术领域。

trans-unit.source: This beautiful gemstone is also the hardest material in the world.
trans-unit.target: 这种美丽的宝石也是世界上最坚硬的材料。

trans-unit.source: A core component to making metals.
Copper is used everywhere from electronics to cookware.
trans-unit.target: 从电子产品到炊具，铜的应用无处不在。

trans-unit.source: This extremely rare mineral is well sought after by technology companies.
trans-unit.target: 这种极其稀有的矿物质深受科技公司的青睐。

trans-unit.source: Level up to unlock a new Recipe.
You feel a strange energy from this . . .
trans-unit.target: 你从这里感受到一种奇怪的能量.

trans-unit.source: It's a giant quartz crystal. Think of what you can create from this!
trans-unit.target: 这是一块巨大的石英水晶。想想你能用它创造出什么？

trans-unit.source: Vegetable dishes created as an offering to the spirits of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 为祭祀森林之灵而制作的蔬菜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: The toolset used by the local carpenter.
trans-unit.target: 当地木匠使用的工具箱。

trans-unit.source: Some leftover goods from Thelio's shop.
A sharpened spear that will be useful for hunting larger prey.
trans-unit.target: 削尖的长矛，在捕猎大型猎物时非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Powerful spear topped with a rare crystal shard.
trans-unit.target: 威力强大的长矛，顶端镶有罕见的水晶碎片。

trans-unit.source: A double-pronged spear crafted from the rarest crystals.
trans-unit.target: 用最稀有的水晶打造的双叉长矛。

trans-unit.source: It's a little flimsy, but it still gets the job done.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有点轻飘飘的，但还是能完成工作。

trans-unit.source: Reliable new fishing rod from the Noke fishing company.
trans-unit.target: 诺克钓鱼公司生产的可靠的新型钓竿。

trans-unit.source: Carbon fiber rod embedded with crystals for extra strength.
trans-unit.target: 碳纤维杆嵌入水晶，强度更高。

trans-unit.source: Legendary fishing rod fit only for the king of the seas.
trans-unit.target: 只适合海洋之王的传奇钓竿。

trans-unit.source: Quality sports bow from the Carbone corporation.
trans-unit.target: 卡邦公司生产的优质运动弓。

trans-unit.source: Powerful hunting bow used only by the most experienced hunters.
trans-unit.target: 只有最有经验的猎人才能使用的强力猎弓。

trans-unit.source: This bow glitters and shines like the stars in the universe.
trans-unit.target: 这只蝴蝶结就像宇宙中的星星一样闪闪发光。

trans-unit.source: A well crafted wood bow for long-range hunting.
trans-unit.target: 制作精良的木弓，适合远距离狩猎。

trans-unit.source: This complicated modern bow is designed for quick shooting.
trans-unit.target: 这种复杂的现代弓专为快速射击而设计。
它散发出一种奇异的力量.

trans-unit.source: A prototype from the LELSH R&D department. This bow uses magnetic forces to fire projectiles.
trans-unit.target: 来自 LELSH 研发部门的原型。这种弓利用磁力发射弹丸。

trans-unit.source: It's a little bit rusty, but still useful for foraging.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有点生锈，但在觅食时还是很有用的。

trans-unit.source: This is great for cutting away foliage.
This powerful scythe can cut through foliage like a hot knife through butter.
trans-unit.target: 这种强大的镰刀能像热刀切黄油一样切开树叶。

trans-unit.source: This golden scythe is a long-lost relic from the Egyptian empire.
trans-unit.target: 这把金镰刀是埃及帝国失传已久的遗物。

trans-unit.source: It's a little shabby looking, but it still looks dangerous.
trans-unit.target: 虽然看起来有点破旧，但仍然很危险。

trans-unit.source: The roots twist and turn in a mesmerizing fashion.
trans-unit.target: 树根蜿蜒曲折，令人目不暇接。

trans-unit.source: A long-lost weapon of Chinese origin. It looks to be in good condition.
trans-unit.target: 一件失传已久的中国武器。看起来保存完好。

trans-unit.source: This deadly pincer can pierce through stone like a hot knife through butter.
trans-unit.target: 这种致命的钳子能像热刀切黄油一样刺穿石头。

trans-unit.source: This watering can has worn out from extensive use.
trans-unit.target: 这个浇水壶由于使用时间过长，已经破旧不堪。

trans-unit.source: A reliable watering can for all your farming needs.
trans-unit.target: 一款可靠的浇水壶，满足您所有的农业需求。

trans-unit.source: This giant watering can uses compression technology to hold more water.
trans-unit.target: 这个巨型浇水壶采用压缩技术，可以盛装更多的水。

trans-unit.source: This advanced watering can utilizes anti-gravity technologies, weighing almost nothing.
trans-unit.target: 这款先进的浇水壶采用了反重力技术，重量几乎为零。

trans-unit.source: Used for digging up farmed plants. It's a little rusty.
trans-unit.target: 用于挖掘农作物。有点生锈。

trans-unit.source: An old electric mining drill from the late 20th century. You can't believe this is still operational.
trans-unit.target: 20 世纪末的老式电动采矿钻。令人难以置信的是，它竟然还能使用。

trans-unit.source: This drill is used by LELSH Corp. mining operations.
trans-unit.target: 该钻机用于 LELSH 公司的采矿作业。

trans-unit.source: This mining drill is strengthened by diamonds embedded in the drill head.
trans-unit.target: 这种采矿钻头由镶嵌在钻头中的钻石加固。

trans-unit.source: With the power of plasma, this drill will melt through rocks!
trans-unit.target: 借助等离子体的力量，这种钻头可以熔化岩石！

trans-unit.source: Made from the juiciest, ripest apples.
trans-unit.target: 由最成熟多汁的苹果制成。

trans-unit.source: Created by carefully crushing ripe grapes, keeping the skin.
trans-unit.target: 将成熟的葡萄小心碾碎，保留葡萄皮。

trans-unit.source: A fundamental ingredient in brewing, it is created by heating grains in water.
trans-unit.target: 它是酿酒的基本成分，通过在水中加热谷物而产生。

trans-unit.source: Created by carefully crushing ripe grapes, removing the skin.
trans-unit.target: 将成熟的葡萄仔细压碎，去掉果皮后制成。

trans-unit.source: Very sweet! This can be further processed to make alcohol.
trans-unit.target: 非常甜！可以进一步加工成酒精。

trans-unit.source: Cooked rice inoculated with a fermentation fungus.
trans-unit.target: 接种了发酵真菌的熟米饭。

trans-unit.source: A viscous black liquid. It is very sweet.
trans-unit.target: 一种粘稠的黑色液体。味道非常甜。

trans-unit.source: Created by heating Sorghum seeds in water.
trans-unit.target: 在水中加热高粱种子制成。

trans-unit.source: Made by squeezing sugar canes and extracting the juice.
This is a failed brewing experiment.
trans-unit.target: 这是一次失败的酿酒实验。

trans-unit.source: A fundamental ingredient in brewing, it is created by heating wheat in water.
trans-unit.target: 它是酿酒的基本成分，通过在水中加热小麦而制成。

trans-unit.source: Created by extracting liquids during the mashing process. Can be fermented to produce alcohol.
trans-unit.target: 通过在糖化过程中提取液体而产生。可发酵产生酒精。

trans-unit.source: Apple juice that has been fermented to produce alcohol. You shouldn't drink this yet.
trans-unit.target: 经过发酵产生酒精的苹果汁。现在还不能喝。

trans-unit.source: Grape juice that has undergone fermentation to produce alcohol.
trans-unit.target: 经过发酵产生酒精的葡萄汁。

trans-unit.source: This golden liquid looks enticing, but not yet ready for consumption.
trans-unit.target: 这种金黄色的液体看起来很诱人，但还不能食用。

trans-unit.source: It looks gross, but this mixture can be turned into wine.
trans-unit.target: 看起来很恶心，但这种混合物可以酿成葡萄酒。

trans-unit.source: The sorghum has been fermented to produce alcohol.
trans-unit.target: 高粱经过发酵后可以产生酒精。

trans-unit.source: The sugars from sugarcane is broken down by yeast, creating alcohol.
trans-unit.target: 甘蔗中的糖被酵母分解后产生酒精。

trans-unit.source: A white-colored alcohol made from fermenting rice.
trans-unit.target: 一种用大米发酵制成的白色酒精。

trans-unit.source: A fermenting mass made from rice, koji, and water.
trans-unit.target: 由大米、麴和水制成的发酵块。

trans-unit.source: An alcoholic solution made from molasses.
trans-unit.target: 用糖蜜制成的酒精溶液。

trans-unit.source: An alcoholic solution made from wheat mash.
trans-unit.target: 用麦芽浆制成的酒精溶液。

trans-unit.source: This is a failed brewing experiment.
trans-unit.target: 这是一次失败的酿酒实验。

trans-unit.source: An alcoholic solution made from grain mash.
trans-unit.target: 用谷物醪制成的酒精溶液。

trans-unit.source: The result of a failed brewing experiment.
A mixture of organic waste. Increases the crop yield of farmed plants.
trans-unit.target: 有机废物的混合物。提高农作物产量。

trans-unit.source: This improved compost can greatly increase your crop yield.
trans-unit.target: 这种改良堆肥可以大大提高作物产量。

trans-unit.source: Enrich your crops with an abundance of nutrients! Massively increases crop yield.
trans-unit.target: 为作物提供丰富的养分！大幅提高作物产量

trans-unit.source: To use compost, enter planting mode and cycle through available compost.
trans-unit.target: 要使用堆肥，请进入种植模式并循环使用可用堆肥。

trans-unit.source: -(value1)% Stamina Decay but staff has -(value2)% Movespeed
trans-unit.target: -(value1)%体力衰减，但法杖具有-(value2)%移动速度

trans-unit.source: +(value1)% Movespeed but staff has +(value2)% Stamina Decay.
trans-unit.target: 移动速度+(value1)%，但法杖的耐力衰减+(value2)%。

trans-unit.source: +(value1)% Dish Quality but staff has a (value2)% Chance of Confusion.
trans-unit.target: 菜肴质量 +（数值 1）%，但工作人员有（数值 2）%的几率造成混乱。

trans-unit.source: +(value1) Social bonus but staff has +(value2)% Stamina Decay.
trans-unit.target: +(value1)社交奖励，但法杖的体力衰减率为 +(value2)%。

trans-unit.source: Never needs to rest, but staff has a (value1)% Chance of Confusion.
trans-unit.target: 从不需要休息，但会有 (value1)% 的几率造成混乱。

trans-unit.source: +(value1) Cooking bonus but staff has +(value2)% Stamina Decay.
trans-unit.target: +(value1)烹饪奖励，但法杖的体力衰减为 +(value2)%。

trans-unit.source: Performs tasks (value1)% faster but staff has +(value2)% Stamina Decay.
trans-unit.target: 执行任务的速度（value1）%，但工作人员的体力衰减 +(value2)%。

trans-unit.source: Level up to unlock a new Skill.
You can now enhance - Common - Molecular dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以增强 - 普通 - 分子菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +60% Revenue earned by Molecular dishes cooked by Player.
trans-unit.target: 玩家烹饪的分子菜肴可获得 +60% 的收入。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Rare - Molecular dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以增强 - 稀有 - 分子菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +20% Cook speed for Stove & Ice Cream Maker appliances.
trans-unit.target: 炉灶和冰淇淋机设备的烹饪速度 +20%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Epic - Molecular dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强分子菜肴的史诗效果。

trans-unit.source: +5% Dish Quality to all dishes cooked.
You can now enhance - Common - Mixology dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以改进普通的混合菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +10% Satisfaction to customers who order Mixology dishes.
trans-unit.target: 订购混合菜肴的顾客满意度 +10%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Rare - Mixology dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以强化稀有的混合菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +25% Cook speed to all Mixology dishes.
trans-unit.target: 所有混合菜肴的烹饪速度 +25%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Epic - Mixology dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以为调酒菜肴增色添彩。

trans-unit.source: You can now hire Chefs with a Mixology speciality.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以聘用具有调酒专长的厨师。

trans-unit.source: +(value)% Chance of maximum dish quality when preparing Mixology dishes. Prioritize Mixology dishes.
trans-unit.target: 制作混合菜肴时，获得最高菜肴质量的几率为 +(值)%。优先考虑混合菜肴。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Common - Seafood dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 普通 - 海鲜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +15% Cook speed for Steamer & Frier appliances.
trans-unit.target: +蒸锅和油炸锅的烹饪速度提高 15%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Rare - Seafood dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 稀有 - 海鲜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +10% Dish quality to all Seafood dishes.
trans-unit.target: 所有海鲜菜肴的菜肴品质 +10%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Epic - Seafood dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 史诗 - 海鲜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: You can now hire Chefs with a Poissonier speciality.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以聘用具有 Poissonier 特色的厨师。

trans-unit.source: +(value)% Cook speed when preparing Seafood dishes. Prioritize Seafood dishes.
trans-unit.target: +(value)% 烹饪海鲜菜肴时的烹饪速度。优先烹制海鲜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Common - Meat dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 普通 - 肉类菜肴。

trans-unit.source: Cooking speed for Oven and Grill appliances increased by 15%.
trans-unit.target: 烤箱和烧烤设备的烹饪速度提高了 15%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Rare - Meat dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 珍贵 - 肉类菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +10% Dish quality to all Meat dishes.
trans-unit.target: 所有肉类菜肴的菜肴品质 +10%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Epic - Meat dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以增强 - 史诗 - 肉类菜肴。

trans-unit.source: You can now hire Chefs with a Pitmaster speciality.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以聘用具有 Pitmaster 特长的厨师。

trans-unit.source: (value)% Minimum dish quality when preparing Meat dishes. Prioritize Meat dishes.
trans-unit.target: (value)% 制作肉类菜肴时的最低菜肴质量。优先考虑肉类菜肴。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Common - Vegetable dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 普通 - 蔬菜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +5% Satisfaction to customers who order Vegetable dishes.
trans-unit.target: 点蔬菜菜肴的顾客满意度 +5%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Rare - Vegetable dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 珍贵 - 蔬菜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: +25% Cook speed to all Vegetable dishes.
trans-unit.target: 所有蔬菜菜肴的烹饪速度 +25%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Epic - Vegetable dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以增强 - 史诗 - 蔬菜菜肴。

trans-unit.source: You can now hire Chefs with a Nature Spirit speciality.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以聘用具有自然精神特长的厨师。

trans-unit.source: +(value)% Dish quality when preparing Vegetarian dishes. Removes dish quality limit. Prioritize Vegetable dishes.
trans-unit.target: +(value)% 制作素食菜肴时的菜肴质量。取消菜肴质量限制。优先考虑素菜。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Common - Baked dishes.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以增强 - 普通 - 烘焙菜肴。

trans-unit.source: Minimum 50% dish quality for all Baked dishes.
trans-unit.target: 所有烘焙菜肴的菜肴质量不低于 50%。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Rare - Baked dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以增强 - 珍贵 - 烘焙菜肴。

trans-unit.source: 30% Chance to not consume ingredients when cooking Baked dishes.
trans-unit.target: 烹饪烘焙菜肴时有 30% 的几率不消耗食材。

trans-unit.source: You can now enhance - Epic - Baked dishes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以增强 “史诗 ”烘焙菜肴的效果。

trans-unit.source: You can now hire Chefs with a Patissier speciality.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以聘用糕点师专业的厨师。

trans-unit.source: +(value)% Cook speed when preparing Baked dishes. Prioritize Baked dishes.
trans-unit.target: +(value)% 准备烘焙菜肴时的烹饪速度。优先考虑烘焙菜肴。

trans-unit.source: Your knowledge of the land allows you to fast travel back to home quickly.
trans-unit.target: 您对这片土地的了解让您可以快速返回家园。

trans-unit.source: +5% Dish quality when player is cooking.

trans-unit.target: 人际关系发展速度提高 15%。

trans-unit.source: You now have the knowledge to identify various wild vegetation.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您已经掌握了识别各种野生植被的知识。

trans-unit.source: Increased chance of collecting plant roots and extra ingredients when harvesting wild plants.
trans-unit.target: 采集野生植物时，有更大几率采集到植物根茎和额外成分。

trans-unit.source: +15% Cooking speed when player is cooking.
You can receive gifts from friends. Gifts will appear in your mailbox.
trans-unit.target: 您可以接收朋友赠送的礼物。礼物会出现在您的邮箱中。

trans-unit.source: You might discover new recipes when reading library books.
trans-unit.target: 在阅读图书馆书籍时，您可能会发现新的食谱。

trans-unit.source: You can now use greenhouses to grow and harvest your own ingredients.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以利用温室种植和收获自己的食材。

trans-unit.source: The Greenhouse must be unlocked to learn this skill.
trans-unit.target: 学习此技能必须先解锁温室。

trans-unit.source: You can now acquire brewing machines and brewing your own alcohol ingredients.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以购买酿酒机，自己酿造酒精原料。

trans-unit.source: You must have completed Le Sequoia's grand opening to learn this skill.
trans-unit.target: 您必须完成 Le Sequoia 的盛大开幕活动，才能学习这项技能。
10% 购买商品时享受更优惠的价格。

trans-unit.source: Hired staff will improve their skills over time (maximum +2 from base value).
trans-unit.target: 随着时间的推移，受聘人员的技能将得到提高（在基础值的基础上最多提高 +2）。

trans-unit.source: You can now purchase vending machines around town and sell Consumables and edible Ingredients. Items sell slowly over time but are sold at a high price point.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以在城镇周围购买自动售货机，出售消耗品和可食用原料。这些物品会随着时间的推移慢慢售出，但售价较高。

trans-unit.source: Can identify various wild animals and their potential drops.
trans-unit.target: 能识别各种野生动物及其可能的坠落物。

trans-unit.source: Can walk closer to animals without alerting them.
trans-unit.target: 能走近动物而不惊动它们。

trans-unit.source: Becoming 'Friends' with shopkeepers allows scheduled ingredient deliveries to your restaurants.
trans-unit.target: 与店主成为 “朋友 ”后，可以按计划向您的餐厅运送食材。

trans-unit.source: You must have completed Le Sequoia's grand opening to learn this skill.
trans-unit.target: 您必须完成 Le Sequoia 的盛大开幕活动，才能学习这项技能。

trans-unit.source: You can now hire epic level chefs and waiters. 8 Recruitment slots are now available instead of 4.
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以雇佣史诗级别的厨师和服务员。现在可提供 8 个招聘名额，而不是 4 个。

trans-unit.source: Treasure troves with unique rewards can be found on beaches and in caves. Use a spade to dig up treasure.
trans-unit.target: 在海滩和洞穴中可以找到具有独特奖励的宝藏。使用铲子挖掘宝藏。

trans-unit.source: Special fishing spots will appear with a chance to catch Giant fish. Unique sunken treasures can be obtained from giant fish.
trans-unit.target: 特殊钓鱼点将会出现，并有机会钓到巨型鱼。从巨鱼身上可以获得独特的沉没宝藏。

trans-unit.source: Higher chance for recipes to appear in shops.
trans-unit.target: 提高食谱在商店中出现的几率。

trans-unit.source: Recipes can now appear in vending machines.
trans-unit.target: 食谱现在可以出现在自动售货机上。

trans-unit.source: Full resistance to heat without needing heat-resistant clothing and items.
trans-unit.target: 完全耐热，无需耐热服装和物品。

trans-unit.source: Chance for wildlife to drop recipes and equipment.
trans-unit.target: 野生动物有机会掉落配方和装备。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to open second research facility with molecular gastronomy, mixology, and seafood.
trans-unit.target: 允许您开设分子美食、调酒和海鲜的第二家研究机构。

trans-unit.source: Host private events in your restaurant. You can accept private events from the bulletin board.
trans-unit.target: 在餐厅举办私人活动 您可以在公告板上接受私人活动。

trans-unit.source: Harvesting natural ingredients will now reveal their location on the map
trans-unit.target: 收获天然材料现在会在地图上显示其位置

trans-unit.source: +400% experience gained from discovering new ingredient sources.
trans-unit.target: 发现新的原料来源可获得 +400% 的经验值。

trans-unit.source: Animals have a chance of dropping material items.
trans-unit.target: 动物有几率掉落材料物品。

trans-unit.source: Harvesting plants and clearing farming patches will yield more roots.
trans-unit.target: 收获植物和开垦农田会产生更多的根系。

trans-unit.source: Your reputation occasionally attracts celebrity customers. Receive special item rewards after successfully serving these guests. The better their dining experience, the better the reward.
trans-unit.target: 您的声誉偶尔会吸引名人客户。成功为这些客人提供服务后，可获得特殊物品奖励。他们的用餐体验越好，奖励就越丰厚。
员工能量消耗速度降低 50%。

trans-unit.source: Boosts from brewed Tea and Coffee have 2x effectiveness for staff members.
trans-unit.target: 工作人员从冲泡的茶和咖啡中获得的提升效果是原来的 2 倍。

trans-unit.source: Once per day, automatically replenish health and energy to 100% if health or energy falls below 15%.
trans-unit.target: 每天一次，当生命值或能量值低于 15%时，自动将生命值和能量值补充到 100%。

trans-unit.source: Spear and bow attacks have a 15% chance of 3x damage and slowing enemies for 4 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 长矛和弓箭攻击有 15%的几率造成 3 倍伤害并减速敌人 4 秒。

trans-unit.source: This effect pierces shields and ignores resistances.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可穿透护盾并无视抗性。

trans-unit.source: +10% Dish quality for all dishes cooked by player and removes quality limit.
trans-unit.target: 玩家烹饪的所有菜肴品质 +10%，并取消品质限制。

trans-unit.source: You can attract Legendary level staff.
trans-unit.target: 您可以吸引传奇级别的员工。

trans-unit.source: You can now view the decor values of all furniture pieces and total decor value of your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以查看所有家具的装饰价值和餐厅的总装饰价值。

trans-unit.source: You can now see the growth stages of farmed plants.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以看到养殖植物的生长阶段。

trans-unit.source: +20% Ingredient yield from harvesting farmed plants.
trans-unit.target: 收获养殖植物的成分产量 +20%。

trans-unit.source: Chance to discover new recipes when the player is cooking during a restaurant service. Discovered recipes must have at least one common ingredient as the dish cooked by the player.
trans-unit.target: 玩家在餐厅烹饪时有机会发现新菜谱。发现的菜谱必须与玩家烹饪的菜肴至少有一种相同的配料。

trans-unit.source: The more dishes the player has cooked, the higher the chance of discovering recipes.
trans-unit.target: 玩家烹饪的菜肴越多，发现菜谱的几率就越高。

trans-unit.source: You can now identify happiness and patience levels of customers.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以识别客户的幸福感和耐心程度。

trans-unit.source: Staff members will speak to impatient customers to boost their happiness and patience.
trans-unit.target: 工作人员会与不耐烦的顾客交谈，提升他们的幸福感和耐心。
